src:
Ini Petuah Ashley Young untuk Skuat Muda Manchester United
07 Nov 2019, 19:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Kapten Manchester United, Ashley Young merasa bangga melihat ada banyak pemain muda yang menembus tim utama Manchester United. Young berharap para pemain muda itu terus bekerja keras untuk membuktikan kemampuan mereka.
Sejak Solskjaer menjabat sebagai manajer MU, ia mengambil keputusan besar. Ia banyak mengorbitkan pemain akademi MU ke tim utama Manchester United.
Solskjaer sendiri tidak sekedar mengorbitkan para pemain muda ini. Pelatih asal Norwegia itu berdedikasi dengan memberikan jam bermain secara konsisten untuk para skuat muda Manchester United.
Young sendiri merasa senang melihat ada banyak pemain muda yang menembus tim mereka. "Pemain seperti Mason [Greenwood], Jimmy [Garner], [Tahith] Chong, Angel [Gomes], Brandon [Williams] dan beberapa pemain muda lainnya telah bermain dengan luar biasa," ujar Young kepada MUTV.

Baca komentar lengkap sang bek di bawah ini.
text:
This is Ashley Young's advice for the Manchester United Youth Squad
Nov 7 2019, 19:00 by Bola.net
Soccer - Manchester United captain Ashley Young is proud to see there are many young players who break into the Manchester United first team. Young hopes the young players continue to work hard to prove their abilities.
Since Solskjaer served as MU manager, he made a big decision. He orbited many MU academy players to the Manchester United first team.
Solskjaer himself is not just orbiting these young players. The Norwegian coach is dedicated to providing consistent playing hours for the young Manchester United squad.
Young himself was pleased to see that there were many young players who had penetrated their team. "Players like Mason [Greenwood], Jimmy [Garner], [Tahith] Chong, Angel [Gomes], Brandon [Williams] and several other young players have played extraordinary," Young told MUTV.

Read the full defender's comments below.
